name: Monsters: Inside you?
description:
Little monsters, big monsters, there's no difference really. We all have it, even my three years old baby knows that. 

Dia: "Mama I am scared,"
Me: "Why?"
Dia: "I'm scared,"
Me: "Well, there's no need to be afraid now. What is it?"
Dia: "There's a monster over there," (she pointed to the window)

This happens a lot. After that she's obsessed with drawing monsters, this artwork was one of them. She drew on paper, captured using adobe capture, and colored in Ps. 

--
This project is a collaborative & learning platform between a tired mother and her (almost) three years old. Support our journey into NFT by collecting our creations or connect with us via Twitter. We'd love to make some new friends!

"Inside You"
2000 x 2000
png
